DOC.brief_summary: The investigators want to show that steroid creme and even better alcohol swaps are just as effective or equal to the current treatment with silver nitrate of granuloma umbilical in newborns.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment of Granuloma Umbilical in Newborn Babies
DOC.detailed_description: The change of treatment will make it possible for parents to treat the children themselves at home, whereas treatment with silver nitrate only is an in hospital regimen.
DOC.criteria: Gestational age more than 37 weeks More than 3 weeks old baby Granuloma umbilical diagnosed by a pediatrician No infections due to the umbilicus Parents do understand and speak danish Gestational age less than 37 weeks Less than 3 weeks old baby Granuloma umbilical not diagnosed by a pediatrician Infections due to the umbilicus Parents do not understand or speak Danish
